The following countries are playable in Millennium Dawn: Modern Day Mod:

Unique Focus Trees

The following countries are playable with unique focus trees:

  • Armenia
  • Abkhazia
  • Afghanistan (Afghan Northern Alliance in 2000)
  • Armenia
  • Azerbaijan
  • Artsakh
  • Belarus
  • Bosnia
  • Botswana
  • Brazil
  • Bulgaria
  • Canada
  • China
  • Comoros
  • Czechia
  • Cuba
  • Denmark
  • Egypt
  • Estonia
  • Ethiopia (Eritrea Puppet Shared)
  • Serbia
  • Shared EU Focus (USoE & POTEF)
  • Finland
  • Fiji
  • France
  • Gagauzia
  • Georgia
  • Germany
  • Greece
  • Gulf tree for BHR, KUW, OMA, QAT, SAU, UAE including shared GCC tree also available to EGY, IRQ, JOR, MOR, YEM
  • Hezbollah
  • India
  • Indonesia
  • Iran
  • Iraq
  • Israel
  • Italy
  • Japan
  • Kazakhstan
  • Kosovo
  • Kyrgyzstan
  • Libya
  • Liechtenstein
  • Myanmar
  • Netherlands
  • Nigeria
  • Norway
  • North Korea
  • Poland
  • Romania
  • Russia
  • San Marino
  • Singapore
  • Spain
  • Sweden
  • Switzerland
  • South Korea
  • South Ossetia
  • Syria
  • Tajikistan
  • Trasnistria
  • Turkey
  • Ukraine
  • United Kingdom
  • United States
  • Uzbekistan
  • Venezuela
  • Yugoslavia
